description:
Today is the last day to complete the assignment to sell 3000 CDs. Each unit is poised to achieve their goals with one last push, but F∞F`s numbers still aren`t climbing. Just before the live concert that will seal their fate and determine whether they are expelled or not, a lost little girl who has gotten separated from her mother appears before Seiya, Kanata, and Akira...
Source: crunchyroll
